name: prl-ccd-definitions
description: Utility to help creating CCD config definitions

scripts.reset-ccd-submodule: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach --recursive git pull origin master && cd ccd-definition-processor && yarn install
scripts.setup: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd ccd-definition-processor && yarn install
scripts.test:crossbrowser-e2e: yarn install && MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=crossbrowser codeceptjs run-multiple --grep "@cross-browser" ${BROWSER_GROUP:-'--all'} -c saucelabs.conf.js --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:uploadFile: yarn install && MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=functional codeceptjs run --steps --grep "@pipeline" -c test/functional/codecept.conf.js --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:debug: yarn install && codeceptjs run --steps --grep "@debug" -c test/end-to-end/codecept.conf.js --verbose --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:preview: yarn install && codeceptjs run-multiple parallel --all --steps --grep "@preview-regression" -c test/end-to-end/codecept.conf.js --verbose --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:master: yarn install && codeceptjs run-multiple parallel --all --steps --grep "@ptl-regression" -c test/end-to-end/codecept.conf.js --verbose --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:functional: echo 'If running on master Functional tests are skipped as they cannot run against the staging environment otherwise Functional tests are running in prl-e2e-test pipeline: https://build.hmcts.net/view/PRL/job/HMCTS_j_to_z_Nightly/job/prl-e2e-tests/job/master/' && exit 0
scripts.test:smoke: yarn install && MOCHAWESOME_REPORTFILENAME=smoke codeceptjs run --steps -c test/smoke/codecept.conf.js --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.generate-excel-all: yarn generate-excel-local && yarn generate-excel-preview && yarn generate-excel-aat && yarn generate-excel-demo && yarn generate-excel-ithc && yarn generate-excel-perftest && yarn generate-excel-prod
